title: A movie for film critics
review: If you're a film critic, this is a wonderful movie. It's a virtually new idea and a total change from traditional horror/suspense movies.If you're a fan of movies, however, you'll probably find it mostly dull, with some rather annoying dialogue. The last five minutes almost save it, but there's just too much resentment built up as a combination of the hype surrounding this movie and the inane dialogue.
